column5:
Aloha,

I'm writing a story for this Sunday's Maui News lifestyle section on methods people can use to find peace and wellness in the new year. I'm trying to find methods people might not have thought of and would like to include your sound therapy as an example. Could you possibly email me a few details on your sound therapy offerings and a couple of comments on what makes this method special? I'm trying to complete my article by Thursday afternoon. Thanks for your time!
